about_the_game:
Tower Dominion is a unique tower defense game with roguelike progression, created by a small but passionate team of fans of both genres. Your empire faces relentless invasions from the savage Artronids, threatening its very existence. As Commander, you are the last line of defense against the continuous assaults of these deadly creatures. In this endlessly replayable experience, every battle brings fresh challenges and unpredictable outcomes.

Unlike traditional tower defense games where the playing ground is predetermined, you control the battlefield by shaping the entire map. Place and rotate new zones with obstacles, openings and powerful neutral buildings to create strategic routes. Split enemy hordes, lead them into traps or bottlenecks, and disrupt their assault.

At the end of each wave, you'll be faced with a crucial decision: What reinforcements do you take? These randomized rewards offer unique combinations of bonuses, resources, buildings and towers.

Buildings are not only defenses, they are also precious resources. In Tower Dominion, each building is offered as a limited reward. Choosing one building over another, where to place it and what upgrades to give it is the key to a successful defense.

Thirty heroes across three factions fight for the honor of leading the defense against the Artronids. Each faction defends a different biome and comes with its own powers, buildings and unique twist on combat.

Survival depends on constant innovation and adaptation. Every alien wave is a unique combination of Artronids that will test your ability to adapt. Are you ready to employ innovative tactics, build impregnable defenses and hold the line? Commander, your troops await your orders!

short_description: Tower Dominion is a roguelike tower defense game where you build out the map while defending your stronghold against alien invasion. Choose from 30 heroes, strategically control enemy waves and upgrade a variety of destructive towers to hold the line!
